response.overview: Officially landed on the Isle of Elba to make a documentary for Rai 1, a crew is actually there to shoot a porn film. The film has to be starred by the diva Edith Costello and by the young actor Salvatore, who is unaware that he had been hired to shoot hardcore scenes. When Salvatore will discover the truth, problems will begin.
response.tagline: Everything that should happen and "doesn't happen" on the set of a "Red Light" film
response.title: Forbidden To Minors
